column8: Counts demand data reads that have any response type.
Counts demand data reads that was not supplied by the L3 cache.
Counts all demand reads for ownership (RFO) requests and software based prefetches for exclusive ownership (PREFETCHW) that have any response type.
Counts all demand reads for ownership (RFO) requests and software based prefetches for exclusive ownership (PREFETCHW) that was not supplied by the L3 cache.
